artist: Engraver: James Bretherton; Artist: After Thomas Orde Powlett, 1st Baron Bolton
description: portrait of George Stubbs sketching; seated; in profile; holding a pallete in PR hand and a brush in PR left hand; galloping horse on easel before him; wearing long jacket; hair tied back and curls over ears
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Mr.Orde f.  Bretherton / A Sketch / Quar cum [?nitentes] Pingere equ!  | on sheet in pencil: 2-443
title: A Sketch
